desc: Display a brief help message. Identical to the help action
Show explanations of automatic installations and removals
Download only
Aggressively try to fix broken packages
Purge packages that are not required by any installed package
Always display a prompt
Do not treat recommendations as dependencies
Treat recommendations as dependencies
Don't perform the actions. Just show them
Schedule operations to be performed in the future
Suppress incremental progress indicators
Show which versions of packages will be installed
Display extra information
Display the version of aptitude and compile information
Start up the visual interface and display its preview screen
Assume the answer yes for all question prompts
Specify the format to be used by the search command
Set the release from which packages should be installed
Specify the order for the output from the search command
Set a configuration file option directly
Specify the display width for the output from the search command
